Levensloopregeling (Article 83): For employees not employed on 1 January, contribution paid in July if employed on 1 July
Levensloopregeling (Article 83): Part-time employees receive pro-rata contribution
leave_information: Kort verzuim (Article 21): Employees have right to paid leave for: festive family events (engagement, marriage, birth, baptism, anniversaries), family circumstances (illness/death of spouse, housemates, (foster)child, blood/affinity relatives), relocation, military inspection/re-inspection, necessary visits to dentist/doctor/specialist/occupational health, outpatient day treatment, hospital admission/discharge of housemates, pension preparation course, exercising voting rights or legally imposed obligation, exams for vocational diploma, registration at UWV WERKbedrijf and job application if dismissed, attending union meetings, non-Christian religious holidays
Kort verzuim (Article 21): Employer deposits value of three working days into Tijdspaarfonds (Article 57a) as compensation for unpaid leave
Kort verzuim (Article 21): UTA-employees not participating in Tijdspaarfonds receive payment for the first three days of short leave. If not used, they are paid out at year-end
Kort verzuim (Article 21): For other calamities (e.g., burst water pipe, fire), employees have a legal right to a short, reasonably calculated period of paid leave
Verlof stervensbegeleiding en rouwverlof (Article 22): 10 days paid leave per 12 months for terminal care of sick partner, (foster)child or 1st/2nd degree blood/affinity relative
Verlof stervensbegeleiding en rouwverlof (Article 22): Right to unpaid leave immediately following the above
Verlof stervensbegeleiding en rouwverlof (Article 22): 10 days paid bereavement leave for death of partner, child or family member as defined in lid 1
Verlof stervensbegeleiding en rouwverlof (Article 22): Employer pays fixed agreed wage/salary for these leave periods
Vakantie bouwplaatswerknemers (Article 23a): Right to three consecutive weeks of summer vacation
Vakantie bouwplaatswerknemers (Article 23a): One extra vacation day if five working days fall between Christmas and New Year

Vakantie bouwplaatswerknemers (Article 23a): Vacation accrual during illness: full disability accrues statutory and senior days for the last 26 weeks. No accrual for supplementary days during illness. If insufficient days for collective shutdown after 26 weeks of illness, employer pays up to 2.5 days
Vakantie uta-werknemers (Article 23b): Employees can choose to deposit the value of up to five supplementary vacation days into the Tijdspaarfonds (Article 57b)

Vakantie uta-werknemers (Article 23b): Vacation accrual during illness: full disability accrues statutory and senior days for the last 26 weeks. Employees participating in Tijdspaarfonds accrue supplementary days for the first 26 weeks

Feestdagen (Article 24): Right to paid leave on recognized general and Christian holidays: both Christmas days, New Year's Day, Easter Monday, Ascension Day, Whit Monday, Liberation Day in jubilee years, and Queen's Day
Feestdagen (Article 24): No obligation for employer to compensate for loss of wages for non-Christian religious holidays

training_information: Scholing bouwplaatswerknemers (Article 61a): Right to two training days per calendar year with retention of fixed agreed wage and contributions/premiums

Scholing bouwplaatswerknemers (Article 61a): If employer fails to provide training or employee hasn't received a course in two years, employee can claim independent right to training

Scholing uta-werknemers (Article 61b): Employer pays costs for mandatory company courses

Scholing uta-werknemers (Article 61b): Right to supplementary/re-training for automation if required to maintain job level, during working hours and at employer's expense
